alert.note: Alert for Allegheny; Armstrong; Butler; Higher Elevations of Indiana; Indiana; Westmoreland (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 27 at 10:20PM EST by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...AN AREA OF HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT SOUTHEASTERN BUTLER...INDIANA... NORTHEASTERN ALLEGHENY...NORTHWESTERN WESTMORELAND AND SOUTHERN ARMSTRONG COUNTIES... At 1018 PM EST, an area of heavy snow stretching from Hampton Township through Vandergrift towards Indiana is moving east at 25 mph. Winds in excess of 30 mph are possible with this area of heavy snow along with reduced visibilities and quick accumulations on roadways. Locations impacted include... Penn Hills, Ross Township, McCandless Township, Indiana, Franklin Park, Vandergrift, Homer City, Apollo, Shaler Township, Plum, Murrysville, Hampton Township, New Kensington, Lower Burrell, Harrison Township, O`hara Township, Bellevue, Wexford, West View, and Oakmont. This includes the following highways... Pennsylvania Turnpike between mile markers 34 and 51. Parkway North between mile markers 6 and 10. Snow will lead to reduced visibilities and hazardous travel conditions.

area.areaDesc: Allegheny; Armstrong; Butler; Higher Elevations of Indiana; Indiana; Westmoreland
